claim.claim-text: 1. A method comprising: ascertaining a value for an option for a particular policy of a plurality of policies that are ranked in a priority order; applying, by a node in a computer network, a variance to the value associated with the option for the particular policy to define a range of acceptable values for the particular policy; determining, by the node, whether one or more other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy; and in response to the determining, if no other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, selecting the option, and if one or more other options exist that have values within the range of acceptable values for the particular policy, repeating the ascertaining, applying and determining for a next lower priority policy of the plurality of policies to consider the one or more other options, the repeating to occur successively until an option is selected.

claim.body: each option is a path in the computer network and the plurality of policies are rules regarding selection of a best path.
claim.claim-text: 2. The method of claim 1 , wherein each option is a path in the computer network and the plurality of policies are rules regarding selection of a best path.

claim.body: each path is a path to a particular destination prefix.
claim.claim-text: 3. The method of claim 2 , wherein each path is a path to a particular destination prefix.

claim.body: the plurality of policies include one or more policies selected from the group consisting of: reachability, lowest round trip time, lowest packet loss, lowest cost, and lowest utilization.
claim.claim-text: 4. The method of claim 1 , wherein the plurality of policies include one or more policies selected from the group consisting of: reachability, lowest round trip time, lowest packet loss, lowest cost, and lowest utilization.

claim.body: further comprising: if there is not another lower priority policy, selecting one of the one or more other options as the selected option.
claim.claim-text: 5. The method of claim 1 , further comprising: if there is not another lower priority policy, selecting one of the one or more other options as the selected option.

claim.body: one of the one or more other options as the selected option is by random selection.
claim.claim-text: 6. The method of claim 5 , wherein selecting one of the one or more other options as the selected option is by random selection.

claim.body: further comprising: assigning a separate respective variance to each policy of the plurality of policies.
claim.claim-text: 7. The method of claim 1 , further comprising: assigning a separate respective variance to each policy of the plurality of policies.

claim.body: further comprising: assigning each of the plurality of policies a respective exclusive priority value to rank the plurality of policies in the priority order.
claim.claim-text: 8. The method of claim 1 , further comprising: assigning each of the plurality of policies a respective exclusive priority value to rank the plurality of policies in the priority order.

claim.body: further comprising: assigning the variance as a percentage value.
claim.claim-text: 9. The method of claim 1 , further comprising: assigning the variance as a percentage value.

claim.body: the node in the computer network is an Optimized Edge Router in the computer network.
claim.claim-text: 10. The method of claim 1 , wherein the node in the computer network is an Optimized Edge Router in the computer network.
